sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer">
      <!--  -->
    </v-navigation-drawer>

    <v-app-bar>
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>

      <v-app-bar-title>Register Grades</v-app-bar-title>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-main>
      <v-sheet class="mx-auto" width="300">
        <v-form @submit.prevent="submit">
          <v-text-field v-model="fullName.value" :error="fullName.errorMessage" label="Complete name"></v-text-field>
          <v-text-field v-model="grade1" :error="grade1.errorMessage" label="Grade 1"></v-text-field>
          <v-text-field v-model="grade2" :error="grade2.errorMessage" label="Grade 2"></v-text-field>
          <v-text-field v-model="grade3" :error="grade3.errorMessage" label="Grade 3"></v-text-field>
          <v-text-field v-model="grade4" :error="grade4.errorMessage" label="Grade 4"></v-text-field>
          <v-btn class="mt-2" type="submit" block @click="submit">Submit</v-btn>
        </v-form>
      </v-sheet>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script setup>
  import { ref } from 'vue'
  import { useField, useForm} from 'vee-validate'


  const { handleSubmit, handleReset } = useForm({
    validationSchema: {
      fullName(value) {
        if(value) return true
        return 'You must enter a name'
      },

      grade1(value){
        if(value && !isNaN(value) && value >= 0 && value <= 10) return true
        return 'Grade 1 must be a number between 0 and 10'
      },

      grade2(value){
        if(value && !isNaN(value) && value >= 0 && value <= 10) return true
        return 'Grade 2 must be a number between 0 and 10'
      },

      grade3(value){
        if(value && !isNaN(value) && value >= 0 && value <= 10) return true
        return 'Grade 3 must be a number between 0 and 10'
      },

      grade4(value){
        if(value && !isNaN(value) && value >= 0 && value <= 10) return true
        return 'Grade 4 must be a number between 0 and 10'
      }
    }
  })

  const drawer = ref(null)
  const fullName = useField('fullName')
  const grade1 = useField('grade1')
  const grade2 = useField('grade2')
  const grade3 = useField('grade3')
  const grade4 = useField('grade4')

  const submit = handleSubmit(values => {
    alert(`Form submitted successfully! ${JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)}`)
  })

  const reset = () => {
    handleReset
  }
</script>
